wall.description.value: Run experiments with or without the wall.

balloonGrabCue.value: Get ready to drag balloon. Once grabbed, press W, A, S, or D key to drag up, left, down, or right. To let go, press space bar.

balloonToggleButton.description.value: Play with two balloons, or just one.

greenBalloonRemoved.value: Green balloon removed from Play Area

greenBalloonAdded.value: Green balloon added to Play Area

yellowBalloon.descriptionPattern.value: Yellow Balloon has a {0} charge, {1} more negative charges than positive charges.

greenBalloon.descriptionPattern.value: Green Balloon has a {0} charge, {1} more negative charges than positive charges.

screen.description.value: This simulation contains a Play Area and a Control Panel. The Play Area is a room. It has a balloon, a sweater and a wall. The Control Panel allows you to add a balloon, remove wall and reset entire experiment. Currently, sweater and wall have many pairs of negative and positive charges, the balloon, just a few. Balloon is in middle of Play Area, evenly between sweater and wall. Tab to navigate to next object.

sweater.descriptionPattern.value: The sweater has a {0} charge, with {1} more positive charges than negative ones.

sweater.noMoreCharges.value: No more charges remaining on sweater

wall.chargeNeutralityDescription.value: The wall has a neutral charge, no more positive charges than negative ones.

resetBalloons.descriptionPattern.value: Return {0} to start position and an uncharged state.
